translation: When the earth is shaken with a mighty quake,
and the earth throws out its burdens[1],
footnotes: [1] i.e., its dead bodies and treasures.

translation: and man says[2], “What is the matter with it?”
On that Day it will recount all its news,
because your Lord has inspired it [to do so].

arabic_text: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتٗا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
translation: On that Day all people will come forward in separate groups to be shown their deeds[3].
footnotes: [3] From the place of Judgment to see the consequences of their deeds, whether to Paradise or to Hell.  [MMCXIII]

arabic_text: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ
translation: So whoever does an atom’s weight[4] of good will see it,

arabic_text: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ
translation: and whoever does an atom’s weight of evil will see it.
